itemInfo.itemDesc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Distilled Water
item.desc:
Clear water that’s been distilled.
- How to Obtain: Distilled Water can be obtained by Heating a Bottle of River Water.

※ Pouring Distilled Water on a Garden will greatly increase the available Water Deposit.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Bottle of Sea Water
item.desc: Water Gathered from the sea using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: Sea Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle by the sea.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Bottle of River Water
item.desc:
Water Gathered from a river using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.
- How to Obtain: River Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle at a river.

※ Pouring a Bottle of River Water on a Garden will increase the available Water Deposit.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Bottle of Turbid Water
item.desc:
Water Gathered from a murky water source using an Empty Bottle. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.
- How to Obtain: Turbid Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle at a murky water source.

※ Pouring a Bottle of Turbid Water on a Garden will slightly increase the available Water Deposit.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Bottle of Clean Water
item.desc: Water Gathered from a clear water source. It can be modified, or used as an ingredient in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: Clean Water can be obtained by using an Empty Bottle at a clear water source.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.
